cab.content: (This Document i* tns Property ofn A- )His Sritannic Majesty'^ Government)Circulated by the Secretary of State for India. SECRET.From Viceroy, 6th November 1917. (Received 4.30 p.m.)Secret. Weekly report. North-West Frontier quiet everywhere except for intertribal fighting in Dir and Bajour. No change in the general military situation in India or Afghanistan.
